title: Prime Number Generator
description: Implement a prime number generator using the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm to find all prime numbers up to a given limit.
requirements: Returns array of all primes up to and including limit
Must use Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm
Handle edge cases: limit < 2 returns empty array
Results should be in ascending order
Time complexity should be O(n log log n)

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function to check if a number is prime.
Implement a function to find factors of a number.
Generate Fibonacci numbers up to a limit.
